Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I do not rely heavily on it at all so I wouldn’t say that it has impacted my learning positively or negatively, I also find that it says contradictory information and I don’t trust it. Definitely a teacher is an invaluable resource though.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I am much more indifferent to feedback from AI. Feedback from my teacher I take in and endeavour to improve on.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: I guess the biggest difference is that you can continue to tweak your work and get as much feedback as you like from AI, alternatively you get the teacher feedback once your work is submitted and its too late to improve the assignment you have received the feedback on. Obviously this is not the point though, it is feedback for future work.
